title: FS: 1940 Wheel Cafe Cincinnati Reds Postcard
author: Bumpus Jones

posts.post_title: FS: 1940 Wheel Cafe Cincinnati Reds Postcard
posts.post_content: Issued by The Wheel Cafe in Cincinnati to commemorate the Reds championship teams of 1939-40 . Postcard measures an unusual 8.5 x 5.5 and remains in good condition despite a surface scratch, some light  creasing and a pin hole through the top center. Asking $125 or OBO shipped. Paypal FF preferred. Please PM me with any questions you may have. Thanks.
